tasks.task: PASS 1 - Scan for potential educational transcripts by looking for institutional headers, logos, or names of schools, colleges, or universities.
PASS 1 - Identify student identifying information such as names, student ID numbers, or dates of birth in header sections.
PASS 1 - Look for structured tables or lists containing course information organized by terms, semesters, or academic years.
PASS 1 - Identify grade columns, credit hour listings, and cumulative performance calculations (GPA, grade averages, etc.).
PASS 1 - Search for registrar signatures, official seals, issue dates, or statements of authenticity.
PASS 1 - Mark all potential transcript areas mentally before proceeding to verification.
PASS 2 - For each potential element, verify it contains cumulative academic records spanning multiple courses or terms, not just a single course or semester.
PASS 2 - Verify the document includes institutional identification and is presented as an official or unofficial record from that institution.
PASS 2 - Analyze surrounding context to confirm this is a transcript and not a report card, grade sheet, or course schedule.
PASS 2 - Reject structures that are actually diplomas, certificates, enrollment letters, or academic planning documents without comprehensive course history.
PASS 2 - Confirm the presence of grading information and credit/unit measurements that indicate completed coursework.
For verified transcripts, extract institutional information including school name, address, and identifying details.
For verified transcripts, extract student information including name, ID number, and enrollment dates.
For verified transcripts, extract course details including course codes, titles, terms, credits, and grades for each listed course.
For verified transcripts, extract cumulative performance metrics such as GPA, class rank, or overall grades if present.
For verified transcripts, extract degree or credential information including conferral dates, honors, and distinctions if applicable.
For verified transcripts, note whether the document is marked as official or unofficial and identify any authentication features.
If no structures meet the strict criteria of comprehensive academic transcripts after verification, respond ONLY with not_found response.
